content.text: Learn how to create tooltips with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to create tooltips with CSS.

content.code_html:
<div class="tooltip">Hover over me
  <span class="tooltiptext">Tooltip text</span>
</div>

content.code_html:
/* Tooltip container */
.tooltip {
  position: relative;
  display: inline-block;
  border-bottom: 1px dotted black; /* If you want dots under the hoverable text */
}

/* Tooltip text */
.tooltip .tooltiptext {
  visibility: hidden;
  width: 120px;
  background-color: #555;
  color: #fff;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 5px 0;
  border-radius: 6px;

  /* Position the tooltip text */
  position: absolute;
  z-index: 1;
  bottom: 125%;
  left: 50%;
  margin-left: -60px;

  /* Fade in tooltip */
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity 0.3s;
}

/* Tooltip arrow */
.tooltip .tooltiptext::after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 100%;
  left: 50%;
  margin-left: -5px;
  border-width: 5px;
  border-style: solid;
  border-color: #555 transparent transparent transparent;
}

/* Show the tooltip text when you mouse over the tooltip container */
.tooltip:hover .tooltiptext {
  visibility: visible;
  opacity: 1;
}

content.text: Tip: To create "clickable" tooltips, go to our How To Create Popups Tutorial
content.html: Tip: To create "clickable" tooltips, go to our How To Create Popups Tutorial

content.text: Tip: Modals are also similar to tooltips. Go to our How To Create Modals Tutorial to learn about modals.
content.html: Tip: Modals are also similar to tooltips. Go to our How To Create Modals Tutorial to learn about modals.
